import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';// Initialize with default URL if not in localStorage
const defaultApiUrl='http://127.0.0.1:11434';if(!localStorage.getItem('ollamaApiUrl')){localStorage.setItem('ollamaApiUrl',defaultApiUrl);}const initialState={ollamaApiUrl:localStorage.getItem('ollamaApiUrl')};const settingsSlice=createSlice({name:'settings',initialState,reducers:{setOllamaApiUrl:(state,action)=>{const url=action.payload||defaultApiUrl;state.ollamaApiUrl=url;localStorage.setItem('ollamaApiUrl',url);}}});export const{setOllamaApiUrl}=settingsSlice.actions;export const selectOllamaApiUrl=state=>state.settings.ollamaApiUrl;export default settingsSlice.reducer;
